feed.subtitle: Melisa K. Savich is a cybersecurity research engineer specializing in fuzzing, CI/CD pipelines, and system-level security. Explore her portfolio of innovative technical projects, research, and contributions to open-source cybersecurity.

entry.title: Internet Archive Breach Exposes 31 Million User Accounts

link.title: Internet Archive Breach Exposes 31 Million User Accounts

entry.summary: Internet Archive breach exposed 31M accounts. Protect your data now by updating passwords, enabling MFA, and using Have I Been Pwned.
